attributes.action: Get Theresa May to call a second referendum and then resign.
attributes.background: Brexit is tearing our country apart. Let's stop it in its tracks.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister. 

You might also like to sign one of these petitions: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231461
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235138
